resources.string:
· Strong working knowledge and understanding of HTML and JavaScript.

· Practical understanding of code flow and debug capabilities. Knowledge on JQuery, Angular JS, and Any JS Framework would be preferred.

· Working knowledge of API (Application Programming Interface).

· Understanding of Third Party Data Exchange and ETLA processes.

· Experience working with data warehouses, including writing custom SQL queries.

· Experience using web analytics tools (e.g., Site Catalyst, Google Analytics, etc.) will be an added advantage

Type: Contractual / Temporary

CONTRACT POSITION
Experience: 6 Months - 1 Year

Notice Period: 30 Days and Less

Mandatory Skills:
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Database knowledge (SQL), Debugging/troubleshooting knowledge,Excellent Communications skills
